name: Generator
description:
Runs a generation campaing to create new designs using the trained model. 
Requires a dataset and a trained model to be loaded.

inputParameters.name: requested_values
inputParameters.description: List of requested values, each formatted as a string with the following format: 'variable_name:value'.

inputParameters.name: generate
inputParameters.description: Set to True to start the generation process.

inputParameters.name: pick_previous
inputParameters.description: Iterate backward through the list of generated designs, instantiate the previous sample.

inputParameters.name: pick_next
inputParameters.description: Iterate forward through the list of generated designs, instantiate the next sample.
